articles.excerpt: The Elite 8 face off in the most tense March Magic Madness match yet!

articles.value: Countering Etiquette - Blue Players, We Need To Talk
articles.excerpt: Blue players often get hate around the Commander table, but is it always warranted, especially in more casual games?
Alora, Merry Thief finds some technically playable partners to jam in your next build.

articles.value: Brewing Satoru, the Infiltrator in cEDH
articles.excerpt: Turn free creatures into cantrips and accelerate your way to a win condition with this Satoru, the Infiltrator cEDH deck from Sam Black.

articles.value: How They Brew It - Satoru, the Infiltrator and The Magnificent Seven
articles.excerpt: Can't decide which deck to bring to your Commander night? This seven-in-one deck can be commanded by Satoru, Grimgrin, Tormod, and four more!

container.description: Popular decks and cards for Satoru, the Infiltrator
